title: Champion theme option for summoner's rift
body: There should be an option to use the champion's theme/login screen music that you are playing as instead of the summoner's rift theme. Just sayin.

replies.body:
The problem I think with this is over-all volume and length. 

The summoners rift theme is much longer than normal login themes, and has a soft consistent volume over the course of it. 

Login themes tend to have volume changes from the first instance to the chorus, so they'd have to be evened out before being allowed to be swapped out. Not to mention the kind of new system they'd have to implement in order for you to have a choice in a select few themes before the game starts, or even a huge menu that would otherwise distract you on the in-game side. 

That being said, I feel like some themes I would love to include Evelynn, Kindred, Starg Guardian 2.0, and others I can't think of right away to my game. I love the themes, but they'd need tweaked so much.
